post.title: the green dot - canon powershot sx100is
post.content: hi there, can you explain me something for this green dot on the image. the green dot appears only when i focus directly to the sun or some strong reflection of the sun . look at the image > http://img182.imageshack.us/img182/9818/img2031.jpg . is it any problem with my canon powershot sx100 is or no? i hope you'll help me ________________ http://zoriv.blog.com.mk/
